org.modelio.api.ui.swt

Interface IUiToolkit


  • public interface IUiToolkit
    Toolkit that creates advanced SWT components.
    Since:
    3.7.1

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

    • Method Detail

      • createMetaclassSelector

        IMetaclassSelector createMetaclassSelector(org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite parent,
                                           int style)
        Create a metaclass selector widget.
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent SWT composite.
        style - the SWT styles. See Text for available flags.
        Returns:
        the created widget component.
        See Also:
        IMetaclassSelector

      • createDefaultEditionStrategy

        org.eclipse.jface.viewers.ColumnViewerEditorActivationStrategy createDefaultEditionStrategy(org.eclipse.jface.viewers.ColumnViewer viewer,
                                                                                            boolean withTimeDelta)
        Get a default strategy responsible to determine if a cell selection event triggers an editor activation.

        In this implementation, edition can be triggered:

        • Programmatically
        • By pressing F2
        • If withTimeDelta is true, with two clicks on the same object in a duration comprised between 0.3 and 1 second
        • If withTimeDelta is false, with two clicks on the same object
        Parameters:
        viewer - the ColumnViewer to hook
        withTimeDelta - whether to constraint time delta between two mouse click on the same cell
        Returns:
